name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior React Native Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in designing and delivering high-quality applications. Proficient in **React Native**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and building **RESTful APIs** to ensure seamless integration of front-end and back-end systems. Skilled in implementing **UI/UX best practices** and utilizing **Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE)** libraries for IoT projects within energy systems. Familiar with **Git** for version control, and experienced in **CI/CD** practices to enhance deployment efficiency. Recognized for delivering impactful solutions at leading companies such as VISA and Reply Polska, with a strong emphasis on high performance and scalability.

experience.responsibilities:
Leveraged **React Native** to develop intuitive mobile applications for energy systems, ensuring a seamless user experience and adherence to **UI/UX best practices**.
Utilized **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** in the creation and maintenance of **RESTful APIs** for robust data handling and interaction between the application and backend services.
Implemented **Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE)** libraries to enhance connectivity features, achieving reliable communication with IoT devices in an estimated **90%** of test scenarios.
Applied testing tools to conduct comprehensive quality assurance, leading to a **25%** reduction in post-release defects over **6** months.
Employed **Git** for version control, ensuring collaborative development across teams while leveraging **CI/CD** practices to automate deployment pipelines for faster iterations.
Integrated native modules to optimize performance, resulting in application load times improved by **30%** over previous versions.
Actively engaged in cross-functional collaboration to align software solutions with project requirements and advancements in IoT technology.

Developed user-friendly mobile applications leveraging **React Native** and **JavaScript**, enhancing user experiences and interface designs aligned with **UI/UX best practices**.
Integrated **RESTful APIs** for seamless data communication between frontend and backend systems to facilitate real-time updates and user interactions.
Implemented efficient coding practices using **TypeScript** to improve code quality and maintainability by reducing errors by **30%**.
Utilized **Git** for version control and collaboration, ensuring smooth team workflows and trackable project histories across **5** major projects.
Automated build and deployment processes through **CI/CD** pipelines, reducing release time by **50%** and improving software delivery efficiency.
Developed and tested **native modules** and integrated **BLE libraries** to enable connectivity with **Bluetooth Low Energy** devices, expanding application functionalities for ***IoT*** solutions in **energy systems**.
Conducted rigorous testing using various **testing tools**, ensuring reliability and performance optimization across all releases, achieving an average bug fix rate of **40%** pre-release.

Developed modular and user-friendly React Native applications employing **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** for enhanced UI/UX experiences, ensuring adherence to best practices in mobile development.
Engineered robust and responsive **RESTful APIs** to seamlessly connect frontend applications with backend services, improving overall system performance by **30%**.
Implemented continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) pipelines utilizing **Git** and other testing tools, accelerating deployment frequency by **50%** and reducing bugs reported in production.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and integrate **Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE)** functionalities, optimizing device connectivity and enhancing user interaction for IoT solutions.
Conducted thorough testing using industry-standard tools to ensure application reliability and performance, resulting in a **20%** reduction in post-release defects.
Utilized native modules and **BLE libraries** to build efficient energy systems, contributing to project deliverables aligned with client specifications and ethical standards.
Led initiatives for UI/UX enhancements that incorporated user feedback, boosting user satisfaction metrics by **15%** through thoughtful redesign and application performance improvements.

skills:

	Bluetooth Low Energy, UI/UX best practices, native modules, BLE libraries, testing tools, IoT, energy systems, Microservices, Kafka, PyTest, Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Airflow, MLflow
